planet.name: Kepler-57 b
KOI 1270.01
KID 8564587
planet.description: This planet candidate was discovered by the Kepler spacecraft. It transits its host star every 5.73 days for 1.1185 hours. Periodic transit timing variations confirm its planetary nature.

planet.description: This planet candidate was discovered by the Kepler spacecraft. It transits its host star every 11.61 days for 1.7074 hours. Periodic transit timing variations confirm its planetary nature.
